name: 周世偉
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
schedule:
CH1. FUNCTIONS AND LIMITS (1-3 weeks):
Some essential functions; Calculations of limits; Concept of continuity.
CH2. DERIVATIVES (4-5 weeks):
Explicit differentiation; Implicit differentiation; Differentiation rules; The chain rule;
CH3. INVERSE FUNCTIONS (6-8 weeks):
Exponential, logarithmic, Inverse trigonometric, and hyperbolic functions; l'Hospital's rule
CH4. APPLICATIONS OF DIFFERENTIATION (9-11 weeks):
The mean value theorem; curve plotting; Newton's method; Optimization problems; Antiderivative
CH5. INTEGRALS (12-14 weeks):
Area and distance; Definite integral; The fundamental theorem of Calculus
CH6. TECHNIQUES and APPLICATIONS OF INTEGRATION (15-18 weeks):
Integration by parts; Trigonometric integrals and substitutions; Approximate integration; Improper
integrals; Areas and arc length formed by curves; Volumes by cylindrical shells; Area of a surface of
revolution; Differential Equations.
